actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend Gateway National Recreational Area in the States of New York and New Jersey, to authorize the inclusion of North Brother Island.

summary.text: Authorizes the inclusion of North Brother Island Gateway National Recreational Area in the States of New York and New Jersey. Authorizes appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend Gateway National Recreational Area in the States of New York and New Jersey, to authorize the inclusion of North Brother Island.
